weka.classifiers.functions

Interface GMLVQ.CostFunctionsSettings

  • Enclosing class:
    GMLVQ

    public static interface GMLVQ.CostFunctionsSettings
    The interface provides all the cost function related settings.

    • Field Summary

      static Tag[] AVAILIABLE_ADDITIONAL_COST_FUNCTIONS

      the weights used for confusion matrix based cost functions
